Name: Dalo
About the game: Dalo , a combination of dot and halo. A fun and simple puzzle game where you should find a path that goes through all lines only passing through the same line once. Based on the Königsberg Bridge Problem where the task is to find a route where you pass on all bridges but only pass on the same bridge once. Features: •Many levels with more levels added periodically •Many different themes and more themes added periodically •Top 10 Leaderboards for each level* •Create your own custom level* •Share levels with other players* •Play levels created by the community of Dalo* Many Levels to solve: Many themes to unlock: How To Play: Start on a dot Connect all dots passing through all the lines using one stroke Try to solve as many puzzles as you can in this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game. Join the top 10 leaderboards* You're sure to get hooked!! *Feature available on Android and iOS versions only
